description: Overview of the removeOauthProvider method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/classes/BaseAlchemySigner/removeOauthProvider
---

Removes an OAuth provider by its ID if the user is authenticated.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseAlchemySigner } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### providerId

`string`
The ID of the OAuth provider to be removed, as obtained from `listOauthProviders`

## Returns

`Promise<any>`
A promise indicating the result of the removal process
